scripts.deploy: NEXT_DEV=0 && next build && next export && cd out && touch .nojekyll && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/synergy-xdc/synergy-xdc.github.io && git add --all && git commit -m 'initial' && git push origin main -f && cd ..
scripts.deploy-win: next build && next export && cd out && type nul > .nojekyll && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/synergy-xdc/synergy-xdc.github.io && git add --all && git commit -m 'initial' && git push origin main -f && cd ..
